arguments.argument:
if (debug_mode) { draw_set_align(fa_left, fa_bottom) draw_set_color(c_black) draw_set_alpha(0.3) draw_rectangle( view_xview[0], view_yview[0], view_xview[0] + view_wview[0], view_yview[0] + view_hview[0], 0 ) draw_set_color(c_white) draw_set_alpha(1) draw_set_font(fontArial12) draw_text_ext(view_xview + 10, view_yview + view_hview - 10, str, -1, 750)
draw_set_valign(fa_top) }
